<inner> swapAndComplete(prematureInteraction, bubbledInteraction)

Swaps Elements for two interactions and completes first of them. Used for resolving event bubbling issue when events are received in wrong order (older events with lower event.simeStamp received after more recent events).
Parameters:
Name Type Description
prematureInteraction EAM.Interaction.Model Interation for event which was received earlier than should.
bubbledInteraction EAM.Interaction.Model Interation for delayed event which was received later than should.
Source:
  • lib/eam/src/interaction/interaction.js, line 98

<inner> update(i9n, node, eventCreated, event) → {EAM.Interaction.Model}

Decides if Event indicates current or new Interaction that should be created. Used for resolving event bubbling issue when events are received in wrong order (older events with lower event.simeStamp received after more recent events).
Parameters:
Name Type Description
i9n EAM.Interaction.Model Interaction to update
node Node Target Node for event
eventCreated EAM.Time Time when event was created.
event DOMEvent Event.
